name: Fruit Thrower V.1.1
description:
Grab the fruit with your mouse, and throw it into the correct crate!

Fruit Thrower is a game that kind of just happened when I was messing around with throwing objects with the mouse. In this game you just try to get as many fruits sorted as possible. This is the first test release. So please give some suggestions down below. I'm going to update this game asap. 

V.1.1 :

-Added Stats menu

-Added HighScore

-Added Total Apples, Bananas, and Pears collected in the stats menu

-Added more interactable items in the Main Menu

-Changed logo

-Changed Logo in the Main Menu

Coming Soon:

-Game Sounds

If your interested, join my discord: https://discord.gg/yyuksCF

YouTube:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCezIs5TyYD9TIEsOgvNArkA?view_as=subscriber

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/silvershothdtv

Again, this game is in the works, give suggestions!
